content.p: Assistant Professor of Literary Studies; Mobility Officer, Faculty of Arts Modern and Contemporary Fiction; Comparative Literature; Socio-Cognitive Theory; Nineteenth Century and the Fin de siècle Literature; History of Ideas; Philosophy and Ethics; Critical Theory and Criticism; Film Studies; Phenomenology; Interdisciplinary Studies. I am the convenor for the following UG and PG Modules at UNM ENGL2033 Modern and Contemporary Literature ENGL1035 The Survey of English Literature and Drama (Full-Year) ENGL2028 Victorian and Fin de siècle Literature ENGL4291 What is Literature? ENGL3084 English Language and Literature Dissertation Module (UG) ENGL4171 English Language and Literature Dissertation Module (PG) telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
